itunes:author: iBooks
title: Dan Kennedy: Meet the Author
description: When McSweeney's contributor Dan Kennedy lands himself a job at a major label, he finds himself in way over his head. Kennedy's hilarious memoir, Rock On, is a power ballad to office life and rock 'n' roll.
itunes:subtitle: The author and humorist discusses his memoir.
itunes:summary: When McSweeney's contributor Dan Kennedy lands himself a job at a major label, he finds himself in way over his head. Kennedy's hilarious memoir, Rock On, is a power ballad to office life and rock 'n' roll.
